headline: Review & Preview: Rally Regrets
summary: The holiday season is in full swing, but investors weren’t in the buying mood Monday.  The Nasdaq Composite lost 0.5%.  “Traders are having second thoughts, it seems, about having run stocks up as much as they did last week,” writes Thierry Wizman, global FX and rates strategist at Macquarie Group.

content.title: Review & Preview: Rally Regrets
content.summary: The holiday season is in full swing, but investors weren’t in the buying mood Monday.  The Nasdaq Composite lost 0.5%.  “Traders are having second thoughts, it seems, about having run stocks up as much as they did last week,” writes Thierry Wizman, global FX and rates strategist at Macquarie Group.

headline: Is Salesforce a Hidden Bargain After the Recent 30% Stock Slide?
summary: Wondering if Salesforce stock is a hidden bargain or overpriced in today's market? You're in the right place to get the inside track on what the numbers really say. Salesforce has recently experienced a bit of a rollercoaster, up 2.6% in the last week but still down 10.6% over the past month and nearly 30% year-to-date. These swings are being driven by investors responding to sector-wide volatility and shifting tech trends. Headlines about major AI integrations and new product rollouts are...

headline: Cyber Monday US Spending Growth Trails Europe Amid Tariffs
summary: Global online spending, mostly from Europe, increased 5.3% as of noon New York time compared with the year ago period, while US spending rose by 2.6%, according to Salesforce, which tracks transactions of 1.5 billion consumers.  Salesforce said earlier that global Black Friday spending grew twice as fast as US sales.

content.title: Cyber Monday US Spending Growth Trails Europe Amid Tariffs
content.summary: Global online spending, mostly from Europe, increased 5.3% as of noon New York time compared with the year ago period, while US spending rose by 2.6%, according to Salesforce, which tracks transactions of 1.5 billion consumers.  Salesforce said earlier that global Black Friday spending grew twice as fast as US sales.

headline: Kumo Honored on Inc. Magazine's Best in Business List for 2025
summary: Kumo, a leader in predictive AI, announced today that it has been named on Inc. Magazine's annual Best in Business list, which celebrates companies pushing meaningful advances in business and innovation. Kumo was recognized in the Best Startups category for a year of major milestones, including the launch of its novel Relational Foundation Model, KumoRFM. Kumo joins a select list of companies vetted for their impact and proudly joins past honorees such as Gong, Notion, and Salesforce.

content.title: Kumo Honored on Inc. Magazine's Best in Business List for 2025

Magazine's annual Best in Business list, which celebrates companies pushing meaningful advances in business and innovation. Kumo was recognized in the Best Startups category for a year of major milestones, including the launch of its novel Relational Foundation Model, KumoRFM. Kumo joins a select list of companies vetted for their impact and proudly joins past honorees such as Gong, Notion, and Salesforce.

thumbnail.caption: Kumo, cutting edge AI that can query the future (PRNewsfoto/Kumo.AI)

summary: AutoRABIT, the leading provider of Salesforce DevSecOps and security solutions, announces two significant milestones in its commitment to protecting government and regulated Salesforce environments: AutoRABIT CodeScan and Guard achieved a FedRAMP Moderate ATO.

content.summary: AutoRABIT, the leading provider of Salesforce DevSecOps and security solutions, announces two significant milestones in its commitment to protecting government and regulated Salesforce environments: AutoRABIT CodeScan and Guard achieved a FedRAMP Moderate ATO.

summary: OpenAI will push back its rollout of other products to focus on improving ChatGPT amid competitive threats from Google and Anthropic.

headline: Informatica Announces New Integrations with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, Empowering the Agentic Enterprise with Unified, Intelligent Data to build Trusted AI Agents and Applications
summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., December 02, 2025--Informatica from Salesforce, a leader in enterprise AI-powered cloud data management, today unveiled new advancements at AWS re:Invent 2025 that deepen the integration between Informatica’s Intelligent Data Management Cloud (IDMC) platform and Amazon Web Services (AWS). These updates give customers a stronger foundation to build enterprise-grade AI agents powered by trusted, high-quality and well-governed data.

content.title: Informatica Announces New Integrations with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore, Empowering the Agentic Enterprise with Unified, Intelligent Data to build Trusted AI Agents and Applications
content.summary: REDWOOD CITY, Calif., December 02, 2025--Informatica from Salesforce, a leader in enterprise AI-powered cloud data management, today unveiled new advancements at AWS re:Invent 2025 that deepen the integration between Informatica’s Intelligent Data Management Cloud (IDMC) platform and Amazon Web Services (AWS). These updates give customers a stronger foundation to build enterprise-grade AI agents powered by trusted, high-quality and well-governed data.

headline: OutSystems Appoints Kim Seabrook as Chief Revenue Officer
summary: BOSTON, December 02, 2025--OutSystems, the leading AI-powered low-code development platform, today announced the appointment of Kim Seabrook as Chief Revenue Officer. A growth-driven revenue leader with more than 30 years of experience in enterprise sales and 16 years in executive leadership, Seabrook is known for guiding global enterprises through major transformations, and for her ability to align go-to-market (GTM) strategy, culture, and execution.

content.title: OutSystems Appoints Kim Seabrook as Chief Revenue Officer
content.summary: BOSTON, December 02, 2025--OutSystems, the leading AI-powered low-code development platform, today announced the appointment of Kim Seabrook as Chief Revenue Officer. A growth-driven revenue leader with more than 30 years of experience in enterprise sales and 16 years in executive leadership, Seabrook is known for guiding global enterprises through major transformations, and for her ability to align go-to-market (GTM) strategy, culture, and execution.

summary: Globant(NYSE: GLOB), a digitally native company that helps organizations thrive in a digital and AI-powered future, today announced it was recognized by Salesforce for achieving the expert-level implementation in MuleSoft Anypoint, Data Cloud and Agentforce platforms — the highest distinction a Salesforce Solution partner can achieve— highlighting its leadership in integration, data, and AI-driven transformation.

headline: Anthropic acquires developer tool startup Bun to scale AI coding
summary: Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic said on Tuesday it has acquired Bun, ​which helps developers run and manage codes more effectively,‌ as the Claude maker looks to boost the speed and stability of its ‌coding agent.  Bun is expected to help Anthropic scale its code‑generation tool Claude Code, which reached an annualized revenue run rate of $1 billion since its launch earlier this year.  Anthropic had already been ⁠using Bun for several ‌months.

content.title: Anthropic acquires developer tool startup Bun to scale AI coding
content.summary: Artificial intelligence startup Anthropic said on Tuesday it has acquired Bun, ​which helps developers run and manage codes more effectively,‌ as the Claude maker looks to boost the speed and stability of its ‌coding agent.  Bun is expected to help Anthropic scale its code‑generation tool Claude Code, which reached an annualized revenue run rate of $1 billion since its launch earlier this year.  Anthropic had already been ⁠using Bun for several ‌months.

headline: GitLab Appoints Jessica Ross As Chief Financial Officer
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, December 02, 2025--All Remote, GitLab Inc. (NASDAQ: GTLB), the most comprehensive, intelligent DevSecOps platform, today announced the appointment of Jessica Ross as chief financial officer, effective January 15, 2026. Ross succeeds Interim CFO James Shen, who will return to his role as vice president of finance.

headline: Salesforce Commands 70% Premium Over Adobe Despite Lower Margins on Agent Bet
summary: Adobe (NASDAQ: ADBE) and Salesforce (NYSE: CRM) both reported earnings showing software giants racing toward AI through completely different routes. Adobe embedded generative tools into its creative suite and launched standalone AI products. Salesforce built an entire autonomous agent platform designed to handle tasks without human intervention.
